description: This topics course explores a Spanish peninsular cultural, literary, and/or linguistic theme from a
base in Spain through analysis and discussion of texts, guest lectures, excursions to appropriate
cultural sites, field research, and related experiential activities.  Sample topics include:
Christians, Jews and Muslims in Spain, and Spain's Autonomous Communities, Spain's
Multilingual and Multicultural Landscape. Taught in Spanish. Prerequisite: SPAN 250.
